data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 49 who are far from you in Southern Islands, New Zealand from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southern Islands, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Southern Islands to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18 believers in the state of Southern Islands.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Southern Islands, New Zealand today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Burmese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Over 48.95 percent of the people of Southern Islands are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Southern Islands, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Southern Islands, New Zealand has a population of 100.

We estimate Southern Islands has 18 people who might know Jesus, 33 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 49 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Southern Islands, New Zealand to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

location.name: Southern Islands
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Iraqi, Han Chinese, Min Nan, Sinhalese, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Punjabi
